title: Stock Futures Creep Up Ahead of Tech Earnings
sub_head: Facebook is expected to post slower sales growth after markets close
body:
U.S. stock futures edged up ahead of a big week of earnings from major technology companies.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 ticked up 0.1% Monday, pointing to an extension of last weekâ€™s rise, which saw the broad market index climb 1.6% and hit a fresh high. Nasdaq-100 futures added 0.2%, suggesting moderate gains for technology stocks after the opening bell. Dow Jones Industrial Average futures were relatively flat.
